extendedInfo.description: Download the free Avengers Live Wallpaper featuring the superhero teamâs logo hovering over a destroyed New York City street with Hulk and Thor in the foreground!Unlock the full Avengers Assemble live wallpaper for just $2.99, including Iron Man, Captain America, Black Widow, and Hawkeye. In addition, unlocking the Avengers Assemble live wallpaper now includes a soundboard... Click on each Avenger to hear popular lines directly from the movie!This version also includes an optional downloadable Avengers Assemble ringtone, featuring the cast, which can be purchased as a bundle with the live wallpaper or individually.The scene can be set to pan so all of your favorite heroes get their much deserved screen time. (Accessible in the Settings Menu)Don't be surprised when the glass on your screen cracks after you receive a text, email or phone call! (Can also be turned on or off in the Settings Menu)So team up with all your favorite Avengers characters from the Marvel Cinematic Universe, and download today!Terms & Conditions: http://www.cellfishmedia.com/terms/Privacy Policy: http://www.cellfish.com/privacy/

reviews.title: its a Scam don\'t buy it
reviews.comment: I paid with my credit card. I got to use the full version for a few weeks. and now it\'s telling me I have to pay again. I have the same phone for 3 Yrs now. so Ik it ain\'t my Google account or my phone. give me my full version or give me my money back. And I bought it when the movie was in theatre.
reviews.author: Jenn Rodriguez

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Sound board could be better though
reviews.author: Darren Apps

reviews.title: Bs!!!
reviews.comment: I had paid for it and now its free..and to make matters worse I had paid for all the avengers and now I have to pay for them again..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty cool.
reviews.comment: Why does Hawkeye only have  one sound? There are good Hawkeye quotes in the movie that could be used! Other than that, I like the app. But Hawkeye is my favorite and I wish he actually said something.
reviews.author: Bailie McCaskill

reviews.title: Not that great
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t do our say much nothing special about it very disappointed don\'t waist your money.
reviews.author: Fabian Hernandez

reviews.title: Reinstalling turned paid app into basic
reviews.comment: Bought & used the full unlocked version (which I enjoyed and would rate higher!) until I had to reinstall my phone and suddenly only had the basic version again... how can I get this fixed?
reviews.author: Fille Kopelman

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I really love avengers especially this live wallpaper it\'s great apps. for me.
reviews.author: Zebede Pahang

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It works so well with my samsung note 2! All da way live! Lol!
reviews.author: Cornelius McDonald

reviews.title: Doesn\'t really work
reviews.comment: The instructions they give you to activate the keyboard didn\'t work on my s4 so I can\'t comment on that purchase. But the full version of the background doesn\'t scroll so you only see the middle (fhe hulk.) It says they fixed the soundboard but it cuts out mid play so I can only imagine how bad it was. Good way to throw away money and time though. Disappointing...
reviews.author: Neil Schultz

reviews.title: Very very nice
reviews.comment: Muy bueno solo que en la galaxy note 2 no sale dana mas que 2 personajes dw frente.
reviews.author: Johnny Tavarez

reviews.title: Fake
reviews.comment: Not free at all, asked to pay money once im in the app
reviews.author: Andre Chan

reviews.title: Weak
reviews.comment: The wall paper looks cool that\'s about it. The sound bytes are garbage. The ringtone/txt/ and alarm tines u get from purchase are the same two garbage sound bytes. Would have love to see ironmans blaster noise or thors hammer drop for txt alerts. Maybe the music from the movie as a ringtone. Dissappointing.
reviews.author: Jason Rodriguez

reviews.title: Great app if your phone/tablet hss the right hardware
reviews.comment: I have the Galaxy S4 and the Galaxy Note 8.0 and it runs awesome on both. Older versions like the S3 or older tablets I guess it is a little sluggish. If you have a newer device buy the all in one pack for $2.99 it\'s a great deal.
reviews.author: James Puffer

reviews.title: Lagging on 4.3
reviews.comment: Im running 4.3 on a htc one. Auto pan on this lwp is lagging. Will increase rating once this is fixed.
reviews.author: Robin Albert

reviews.title: Charged twice!
reviews.comment: Everytime i restart my phone the buy widget keeps on flashing on the upper right side of the screen, even though i have already purchased the app. One time when i clicked it just to get rid of it, my card got charged again.
reviews.author: a\'bren marte

reviews.title: Horrible, Lacking, & Crashes!
reviews.comment: Paid for this last night and wish I hadn\'t. The app has very limited features. No realistic audio. No customizations, and on top of that is buggy, and crashes. Now I just get a black screen. Refund please!
reviews.author: N. Onikoyi Holly

reviews.title: Nice....
reviews.comment: I am in love with it
reviews.author: Christine Nwanodi

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I realy like it.
reviews.author: Khalid Paris

reviews.title: Avengers live wallpaper
reviews.comment: I really like my wallpaper It\'s looks good on phone keep up the good work and I haven\'t had a problem with it so far thank you
reviews.author: Brenda Brooks

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: When you get out of a folder a avengers pop up,pops annoying
reviews.author: Devam Bhuptani
